items.name: Grilled Herb Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken breast grilled to perfection with aromatic herbs and spices.

items.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
items.description: Pasta tossed in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce, garnished with parmesan.

items.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
items.description: Thin crust pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

items.name: Spicy Thai Noodles
items.description: Rice noodles stir-fried with vegetables, peanuts, and a spicy Thai sauce.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with croutons and parmesan.
